<CarlBeek> I'm working on spec-ing out the sequencer deployment strat and I have some questions I'd appreciate some feedback on:

- Does everyone agree that deploying this via Docker is the play (as opposed to native)
- @remco, you mentioned setting up an "HTTPS proxy" previously. What exactly did you mean? What is being proxied & for whom?
- Suggestions for the sequencer URI: `sequencer.ceremony.ethereum.org`? or `sequencer.ethereum.org` etc?
- Should we be running an external (different docker container or w/e) sqlite database and connect via `--database-url`
- Should we lock all the configs/params via explicitly defining constants (not rely on defaults)?
- What is the recommended logging verbosity?
- What `--log-format` should we be using and why `json` or `otlp` etc?
- What does the `--prometheus` param do? it seems to be a stub.

Any & all feedback/answers appreciated
